goal: Perform customer segmentation to inform targeted marketing strategies.
persona: An experienced data analyst specializing in customer behavior analysis, focused on implementing data-driven marketing strategies. The analyst is proficient in basic data analysis and advanced clustering techniques, such as K-means clustering, to identify distinct customer segments based on RFM (Recency, Frequency, Monetary) analysis. Their primary interest lies in enhancing customer engagement and boosting revenue through segmented marketing approaches.
